name: social-crm-v2-airline-classification

examples.text: @JetBlue @FLLFlyer Are conditions always this bad at your airport? (Crowds, heat, mess, broken equipment)
@gregkoch1 @united I miss continental airlines
@united my flight #4806 got cancelled and ur people at the gate said there's no way to compensate. Wanna earn some good PR & help me out?
@united poor Customer service! I was told I didn't have enough time to check in my bag and had to forfeit my flight. @AmericanAir saved me!
@JetBlue @AmericanAir let's all laugh at that one time we all thought it was safe to fly on an @Delta flight.
.@united used to be Continental base here in #Houston. They were GREAT! Free meal, movie. Now gotta pay for EVERYTHING. Rude stewardesses.
@united no I needed someone to check in the bag. According to airport employee, station manager busy on his cell phone
@JetBlue @AmericanAir has the worst customer service in the history of time. Never had a nice person at the desk. Ever.
@united are you guys going to call me to tell me how to proceed?
Let me tell you. .@united is freaking JOKE of an airline! They changed the get on us and didn't tell us. Just got lucky & noticed.
Yet again, no @United ticket agents for premier access & only 2 for economy #fail #travelwoes #Austin https://t.co/Js3qQnadgA

description: This Conversation Workspace will be used for classifying content.
